description:
Before users customize their dashboard, show a data-driven preview using anonymized aggregate statistics from similar organizations: 'Teams like yours typically track X dossiers, Y relationships, and Z active briefs.'

**Rationale:** Empty dashboards provide no context for what's normal or expected. Benchmarking data helps users set appropriate goals and understand how others use the system, accelerating their mental model formation.
title: Dashboard Widgets Empty State with Usage Insights
